name: coastlight-new
description: The website for the digital agency, coastlight digital.

scripts.build: npm run build:sass & npx browserify _src/_scripts/main.js > _src/assets/js/bundle.js & ENVIRONMENT='production' npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.dev: npx @11ty/eleventy --serve & npm run watch:sass & npx browserify _src/_scripts/main.js > _src/assets/js/bundle.js
